<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 maoshiming 于 2024-12-28 13:06 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
一年前送过，原贴地址：<br>
可能是论坛第一个送华住会铂金卡的 - 吾爱<a href="https://www.52pojie.cn" target="_blank" class="relatedlink">破解</a> - 52pojie.cn<br>
https://www.52pojie.cn/forum.php?mod=viewthread&amp;tid=1874379&amp;highlight=%BB%AA%D7%A1%BB%E1<br>
时隔一年再送一次吧。<br>
如题：赠送1个华住会铂金年卡和3个白金季卡。<br>
<br>
说明：华住会的白金卡论坛里很多人能送，但是铂金卡，整个论坛极少有人能送（不是分享账号），<br>
别嫌少，白送的要啥自行车啊。<br>
开通华住会会员：打开邀请链接手机号注册就行了。<br>
<br>
华住会3个白金季卡链接：<br>
https://cdn.huazhu.com/ocatool-mgmfe/#/receive?vNoHead=MGM2015&amp;source=APPHYYCARD&amp;adAccount=&amp;sign=qskLX0ROd0vct61%2FOGCgpQUO4xgLFAyMOBSJCF4ApR7UyQLeKBIeBfQyhowkk%2F%2F0%2BJ2es%2Bvh5sAUNOMsd4OMIo7wYkoKh%2BLjBB05GjPjQDr8DblqXXu0mlC0OsIMGYYaqgfUyXvM%2FzGkpoWFx%2B1228HhhQrDcyvPqCDg4Glem%2ByTBRzOrMsqk0BgSYT9tPfJIwHbgPp92fQ%3D<br>
<br>
<br>
华住会1个铂金年卡链接：<br>
<br>
https://cdn.huazhu.com/ocatool-mgmfe/#/receive?vNoHead=MGM2015&amp;source=APPHYYCARD&amp;adAccount=&amp;sign=qskLX0ROd0sAZFLEeQZNUTwrRzG51LE3cuiCbLJkPVwIFs8tk4Jjwln5CVzo5Imo41FcTUdAvOe4eP2VF3YPNtpZUJ6LlN1ALX%2B0TX6XC67KOccWF38J%2FMxwHMpH7Zw1CL0BlK5OPJf6XubTDLqgSQjf4g3hha8ksSjNtc%2Bk%2BSuBKgwPQh16qMlwYkXKKpS3FdPorQ7lq8o%3D<br>
<br>
<br>
加赠华住会3个白金季卡链接：<br>
<br>
https://cdn.huazhu.com/ocatool-mgmfe/#/receive?vNoHead=MGM2015&amp;source=app&amp;adAccount=&amp;sign=qskLX0ROd0vct61%2FOGCgpQUO4xgLFAyMYoCmHnaiJqP%2BwTkkjPd5kWA4BNbCo514JowoNPdTYNY4WXBJ4vu2dfjYAQJ0Ikl6%2BH%2B2I8qrAIV8UirCFcvqaWla6FrLoy1vepZEXSB9bzJKy9eV7ug0jfCT6Z1jsnd1nn9JLoFmqH0lEpy9aXFCTGHUtiEEyBIs<br>
<br>
<br>
加赠华住会1个铂金年卡链接：<br>
<br>
https://cdn.huazhu.com/ocatool-mgmfe/#/receive?vNoHead=MGM2015&amp;source=app&amp;adAccount=&amp;sign=qskLX0ROd0sAZFLEeQZNUTwrRzG51LE3zxTymItd0685UoD2QsuPUE8xFOkZWHsPtxAx1P65ZNNNnqV4xEO5ncLUWmpxLraamGCx65oZ9vRjbSA3AzR75yQWzhi8sm5vKnn8GCOjRBN7rt6%2BbMAZL5Jfkec5yXmbth8MmNbKF9%2BQQvrq3%2FW%2BK4pcdQdNnJPT<br>
<br>
<br>
以上应该都被领完了，以下为加赠1个华住会铂金年卡。<br>
<br>
<br>
加赠华住会1个铂金年卡链接：<br>
<br>
<br>
https://cdn.huazhu.com/ocatool-mgmfe/#/receive?vNoHead=MGM2015&amp;source=app&amp;adAccount=&amp;sign=qskLX0ROd0sAZFLEeQZNUTwrRzG51LE3hkn4Gollcx7%2B%2FhyNJZMKfNplXmScEGI%2FmnBA%2F4nZtHaaR7SV7529VuXp50%2FHOlFuc2AQPQ4ZUbYrSC8fBgHncm4VTPNHO0r8wOg%2B6gIN7JDIgn9lHjkUpwVvOz9Rn%2BjbP%2B32ujmnYeSHOz5YOET6hvMl68tWIB5u<br>
